results.idea: Momentum: short-term cross-sectional momentum using 1-day percent change
results.description: Used SUGGESTION1 to combine percent move with cross-sectional ranking. SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high userCount/alphaCount field mcr38_percent_change. Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation simple (<7 ops, <=2 fields). Confidence set to 0.75 because 1-day momentum is a classic short-term alpha with decent signal but noise risk.

results.idea: Volume-confirmed momentum: rank percent change and scale by volume
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 to combine price move with liquidity proxy (volume). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION4: chose mcr38_volume and mcr38_percent_change (both high userCount). KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.78 because volume-confirmed moves reduce false signals.

results.idea: Mean-reversion: extreme losers over last day revert
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change to detect extreme losers and cross-sectional quantile to target bottom deciles. SUGGESTIONS: 1 applied (single-field but ranked cross-section), 2/3 not applicable. Preference for high coverage. Confidence 0.62 reflecting short-term mean-reversion risk.

results.idea: Trend-strength filter: take momentum only when ADX indicates strengthening trend
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_adx_strength per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION4 applied (adx_strength has high alphaCount). SUGGESTION3 not required. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.80 because ADX reduces trend-fade noise.

results.idea: Signal consensus: overall_percent * shorttermpercent to favor stocks with aligned horizons
results.description: Used two aggregated signals (mcr38_overall_percent, mcr38_shorttermpercent) per SUGGESTION1 to capture consensus. SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Confidence 0.72 as consensus often improves signal quality.

results.idea: Strength-weighted signal: favor high-rated direction with high strength (direction_rating * strength_rating)
results.description: Combined direction_rating and strength_rating (both high userCount). SUGGESTIONS1 &4 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.74 — rating combinations often amplify true signals.

results.idea: Moving-average confirmation: use MA20 signal to confirm 1-day momentum
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_ma_20_signal per SUGGESTION1. MA20 provides trend filter. SUGGESTION4: fields have decent counts. Confidence 0.7 reflecting medium-short horizon confirmation.

results.idea: Momentum with volatility dampening: percent change divided by ADX strength
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1: momentum modulated by reported ADX strength to dampen noisy weak trends. SUGGESTION4 used. SUGGESTION2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.68 — reduces false positives but may mute returns.

results.idea: Breakout signal from Bollinger Bands combined with daily move
results.description: Used mcr38_bb_signal with mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1 to capture BB breakouts. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.73 as BB breakouts with directional move are actionable.

results.idea: MACD-strength momentum: MACD signal times MACD strength
results.description: Combined mcr38_macd_20_50_signal and mcr38_macd_20_50_strength per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION4 applied. No vectors. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.71; MACD pair often captures medium-term trends.

results.idea: Short-term reversal when strong signal weakens: use MA20_strength decreasing with negative daily change
results.description: Combined mcr38_ma_20_strength and mcr38_percent_change. SUGGESTION1 used. Logic: if strength drops but price fell, expect reversal. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6—contrarian and conditional, modest expectancy.

results.idea: Liquidity breakout: large percent change but low volume filter
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_volume to target moves on thin liquidity (edge cases). SUGGESTION1 applied, SUGGESTION4 used. Risk higher so confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Consensus trend following: long when longterm_signal and mediumterm_signal align
results.description: Combined mcr38_longterm_signal and mcr38_mediumterm_signal to capture multi-horizon agreement (SUGGESTION1). High-level signals have good coverage. Confidence 0.76 for durable trend capture.

results.idea: Signal divergence: buy when short-term is bullish but long-term is bearish (mean-reversion or fade)
results.description: Used mcr38_shorttermsignal and mcr38_longterm_signal to detect horizon divergence. SUGGESTION1 applied. This can exploit overreactions; confidence 0.58 as directional risk exists.

results.idea: Strength normalized momentum: zscore of percent change times zscore of strength
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 combining zscore( percent change ) and zscore( strength_rating ) to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION4 used. SUGGESTION2/3 not applicable. Confidence 0.77 due to normalization improving robustness.

results.idea: Directional pick: rely only on overall_signal but scale by overall_percent
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_signal and mcr38_overall_percent per SUGGESTION1 to combine sign and magnitude. Simple and within KEEP_IN_MIND constraints. Confidence 0.7 for broad directional capture.

results.idea: Volatility breakout with ADX: high percent change when ADX indicates strong trend
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_adx_signal (trend direction) and adx_strength via multiply (two fields at a time—primary with strength). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.76 because ADX confirms breakout quality.

results.idea: Fade extreme BB strength: if BB_strength high and daily move extreme, fade
results.description: Used mcr38_bb_strength and mcr38_percent_change. SUGGESTION1 applied. Fading extremes can work; confidence 0.59 due to timing risk.

results.idea: MACD cross momentum: use macd_20_100_signal with recent percent change
results.description: Combined mcr38_macd_20_100_signal and mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1. Preference due to decent alphaCount. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Range breakout: use high/low spread proxy (last - low) scaled by percent change
results.description: Used mcr38_last and mcr38_low per SUGGESTION1 to form intraday range signal. SUGGESTION4: both have high coverage. Confidence 0.65 for range breakouts intraday.

results.idea: Strength consensus across indicators: average of longterm and mediumterm percents
results.description: Averaged mcr38_longterm_percent and mcr38_mediumterm_percent per SUGGESTION1 to capture multi-horizon strength. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Short squeeze detector: recent large positive percent_change with low short-term signal (unexpected move)
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_shorttermsignal per SUGGESTION1 to find moves opposite to short-term expectation. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.55 due to event-driven nature.

results.idea: Momentum persistence: multiply daily change by yesterday's change proxy using ts_delta-like approach via change field
results.description: Used mcr38_change (1-day change) and mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1 to proxy short persistence. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence 0.6 for persistence exploitation.

results.idea: ADX direction filtered mean-reversion: reverse percent change when adx_direction indicates weakening
results.description: Used mcr38_adx_direction (directional weakening/strength) and mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1. Applied SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.64 as weakening trend can revert.

results.idea: High-confidence signal stacking: multiply overall_percent and trendspotter_strength
results.description: Stacked mcr38_overall_percent with mcr38_trendspotter_strength per SUGGESTION1 to favor high-confidence names. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.79 for combining consensus and proprietary strength.

results.idea: MA50 crossover filter: use MA50_signal to filter medium-term momentum
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_ma_50_signal per SUGGESTION1. Simplicity kept per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Composite strength ratio: overall_percent / shorttermpercent to favor durable movers
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_percent and mcr38_shorttermpercent per SUGGESTION1 to emphasize sustained moves. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Volume spike momentum: percent_change * (volume / median volume proxy using volume itself)
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_volume to capture volume spikes validating moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Fade when trendspotter shows weakening: reverse move if trendspotter_direction low
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_trendspotter_direction via SUGGESTION1. Low direction suggests fade. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: MACD divergence fade: if MACD strength high but price unchanged, fade
results.description: Used mcr38_macd_50_100_strength and mcr38_percent_change. SUGGESTION1 applied. Divergence fades have moderate confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High-strength directional plays: use para_50_strength with para_50_signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_para_50_signal and mcr38_para_50_strength (SUGGESTION1) to back medium-term directional moves. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by Mahilo strength: favor moves where mahilo_strength high
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_mahilo_strength per SUGGESTION1. Mahilo acts as specialized trend filter. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion when BB indicates weakening signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_bb_direction (weakening/strength) and mcr38_percent_change to fade moves when BB shows weakness. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Strength-adjusted breakout: require both high percent change and high trendspotter_strength
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_trendspotter_strength; SUGGESTION1 &4 applied. Confidence 0.75 as strength reduces false breakouts.

results.idea: Consensus short: overall_signal negative and overall_percent large magnitude
results.description: Target names with strong negative overall_signal and large overall_percent magnitude. Used mcr38_overall_signal and mcr38_overall_percent. SUGGESTION1 &4 applied. Confidence 0.7 for directional clarity.

results.idea: Direction-weighted liquidity: prefer moves with volume support and adx_direction
results.description: Combined mcr38_volume and mcr38_adx_direction to favor well-backed trend moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: High conviction fade: reverse when strength_rating high but percent change small (stalled)
results.description: Used mcr38_strength_rating and mcr38_percent_change. SUGGESTION1 used to detect stalled high-strength names. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Two-horizon alignment: mediumterm_signal * shorttermsignal to capture multi-horizon momentum
results.description: Combined mcr38_mediumterm_signal and mcr38_shorttermsignal per SUGGESTION1. Multi-horizon alignment reduces whipsaw. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Percent-change zscore squeeze: ts_zscore-like normalizing of percent change (use zscore)
results.description: Applied zscore to mcr38_percent_change to reduce outliers (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Confidence 0.7 for robustness.

results.idea: Fade momentum when ADX indicates hold heading bearish: reverse when adx signal indicates heading bearish
results.description: Used mcr38_adx_signal and mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1. If ADX indicates shift to bearish while price up, fade. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Strength-weighted volume breakout: volume * trendspotter_strength
results.description: Combined mcr38_volume and mcr38_trendspotter_strength to require both liquidity and strength. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum with MA100 confirmation: percent_change * ma_100_signal
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_ma_100_signal per SUGGESTION1. Longer MA confirms durable move. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Signal magnitude filter: prefer signals with high longterm_percent regardless of short-term noise
results.description: Used mcr38_longterm_percent and mcr38_percent_change. Emphasizes durable trends (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by last price (size-sensitivity): percent_change * last
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change with mcr38_last to scale alpha by price level (SUGGESTION1). Awareness of risk: confidence 0.5 moderate-low due to scaling bias.

results.idea: Strength divergence: high direction_rating with low strength_rating (potential acceleration)
results.description: Used mcr38_direction_rating and mcr38_strength_rating per SUGGESTION1 to find names where direction exists but strength hasn't caught up. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Persistence across signals: multiply para_50_signal and ma_50_signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_para_50_signal and mcr38_ma_50_signal to find cross-indicator agreement (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Weakening trend short: reverse when ma_100_strength declines but longterm_percent still high
results.description: Used mcr38_ma_100_strength and mcr38_longterm_percent to detect weakening long-term trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Composite volatility-momentum: percent_change * (1 / bb_strength) to prefer moves not extreme in BB
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_bb_strength per SUGGESTION1 to reduce taking extreme BB breakouts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Signal acceleration: compare ma_20_strength vs ma_50_strength (ts_delta style)
results.description: Used ma_20_strength and ma_50_strength and applied subtract to proxy acceleration per SUGGESTION1. No ts_delta operator used to keep within 2 fields. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: High conviction long when para_50 and macd agree
results.description: Used mcr38_para_50_signal and mcr38_macd_50_100_signal for agreement (SUGGESTION1). Cross-indicator consensus improves odds. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Volume-weighted mean-reversion: reverse percent change scaled by inverse volume
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_volume. SUGGESTION1 applied to avoid trading heavy liquidity moves. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Trend follow only when ADX direction aligns with trendspotter_signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_adx_signal and mcr38_trendspotter_signal to require two trend indicators agree (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.78.

results.idea: BB breakout with MACD confirmation: bb_signal * macd_20_50_signal
results.description: Used mcr38_bb_signal and mcr38_macd_20_50_signal per SUGGESTION1 to require volatility breakout plus momentum. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Strength-weighted percent change across horizons: shorttermpercent * percent_change
results.description: Used mcr38_shorttermpercent and mcr38_percent_change to amplify short-horizon reliable moves (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Direction-rating scaled fade: reverse percent_change if direction_rating low
results.description: Used mcr38_direction_rating and mcr38_percent_change. Low direction_rating suggests fade. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Trendspotter long-only filter: use trendspotter_signal times last
results.description: Combined mcr38_trendspotter_signal and mcr38_last as a size proxy (SUGGESTION1). Simple trend filter with magnitude. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: MAHILO confirmation of volatility moves: percent_change * mahilo_signal
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_mahilo_signal per SUGGESTION1. MAHILO uses high-low smoothing—useful for breakouts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Pair strength: overall_percent / mediumterm_percent to find accelerating names
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_percent and mcr38_mediumterm_percent to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: MACD strength scaled by volume: macd_20_50_strength * volume
results.description: Combined mcr38_macd_20_50_strength and mcr38_volume to favor strong momentum with liquidity (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Short-term contrarian: reverse when shorttermsignal strongly high but percent_change already large
results.description: Used mcr38_shorttermsignal and mcr38_percent_change per SUGGESTION1 to fade overheated short-term signals. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Long-term momentum anchor: longterm_signal * longterm_percent
results.description: Combined mcr38_longterm_signal and mcr38_longterm_percent to prioritize durable moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.77.

results.idea: Percent-change divided by last price to get relative move per unit price

results.idea: High ADX & MACD consensus: adx_signal * macd_50_100_signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_adx_signal and mcr38_macd_50_100_signal to require two trend indicators agree (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.78.

results.idea: Strength anomaly: high strength_rating but low overall_percent => potential upcoming move
results.description: Used mcr38_strength_rating and mcr38_overall_percent per SUGGESTION1 to detect latent strength. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Two-indicator momentum: para_50_strength * macd_20_100_strength
results.description: Combined mcr38_para_50_strength and mcr38_macd_20_100_strength (SUGGESTION1) to amplify robust momentum. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Fade when BB and Mahilo disagree: bb_signal - mahilo_signal
results.description: Used mcr38_bb_signal and mcr38_mahilo_signal to find indicator conflicts (SUGGESTION1). Conflict often leads to mean-reversion. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Volume-normalized trend: trendspotter_strength / volume
results.description: Used mcr38_trendspotter_strength and mcr38_volume to prefer strong signals on lighter volume for alpha edge. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with MAHILO confirmation: percent_change * mahilo_strength
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_mahilo_strength per SUGGESTION1. Strengthens signal quality; confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Directional momentum using PARA signal scaled by percent change

results.description: Divided mcr38_overall_percent by mcr38_strength_rating to prioritize signals where magnitude outpaces strength (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term breakout fade when ADX weakening: reverse percent_change * inverse adx_strength
results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_adx_strength to fade breakouts without trend support (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: MACD + Volume momentum: macd_20_100_signal * volume

results.description: Used mcr38_ma_50_strength and mcr38_ma_100_strength to detect acceleration between medium and long MA strengths (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Fade on conflicting signals: overall_signal - trendspotter_signal
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_signal and mcr38_trendspotter_signal to find conflicts; subtract to create fade signal (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High conviction momentum: multiply overall_percent and para_50_strength
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_percent and mcr38_para_50_strength per SUGGESTION1 to combine overall magnitude with medium-term strength. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Momentum trimmed by volatility: percent_change / bb_strength

results.description: Used two MACD windows (mcr38_macd_20_100_signal, mcr38_macd_50_100_signal) for stacked momentum (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Strength-adjusted range breakout: (last - open) * para_50_strength

results.description: Combined mcr38_ma_20_signal and mcr38_shorttermsignal to reinforce short-horizon trend signals (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.7.

results.description: Used mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_trendspotter_signal to require proprietary trend confirmation (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Short-term strength anomaly: shorttermpercent - shorttermsignal (magnitude vs sign mismatch)

results.idea: Consensus strength multiplier: overall_percent * mediumterm_percent

results.description: Applied zscore to mcr38_percent_change (SUGGESTION1) to make robust momentum picks. SUGGESTION2/3 not applicable. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: High-percent-change with medium-term support: percent_change * mediumtermpercent

results.description: Used mcr38_ma_20_signal and mcr38_ma_50_signal to require short and medium MA agree (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.71.

results.description: Used quantile(mcr38_percent_change) to implicitly reduce outliers per SUGGESTION1. Simplicity and robustness prioritized. Confidence 0.69.

results.description: Combined mcr38_mahilo_signal and mcr38_para_50_signal per SUGGESTION1 to capture dual indicator alignment. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: High overall_percent but weakening strength: overall_percent * inverse(strength_rating)
results.description: Used mcr38_overall_percent and mcr38_strength_rating to find names where magnitude is high but strength lags—could indicate upcoming reversion or acceleration. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Breakout with MACD strength: bb_signal * macd_20_100_strength
results.description: Used mcr38_bb_signal and mcr38_macd_20_100_strength to ensure breakout has momentum (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Trendspotter consensus: trendspotter_signal * overall_signal
results.description: Combined mcr38_trendspotter_signal and mcr38_overall_signal per SUGGESTION1 to require two signals align. Confidence 0.76.

results.idea: MACD fade when strength falls: reverse macd_signal * inverse(macd_strength)
results.description: Used mcr38_macd_20_50_signal and mcr38_macd_20_50_strength as SUGGESTION1 pair. Fades weakening momentum. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Low-volume accumulation long: inverse(volume) * shorttermpercent
results.description: Used mcr38_volume and mcr38_shorttermpercent to detect accumulation on low volume. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54 due to event risk.

results.idea: Percent-change multiplied by para_50_strength for medium-term validated momentum
results.description: Combined mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_para_50_strength per SUGGESTION1. Medium confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Signal stability: longterm_percent / shorttermpercent to find stable winners
results.description: Used mcr38_longterm_percent and mcr38_shorttermpercent per SUGGESTION1 to reward consistency. Confidence 0.67.
